name: Molten Whip
description: Lash an enemy with flame, dealing 2323 Flame Damage.  If you strike an enemy that is immobile or stunned, you set them Off Balance.  Whenever you activate a different Ardent Flame ability, you gain a stack of Seething Fury, increasing the damage of your next Molten Whip by 33% and your Weapon and Spell Damage by 75 for 10 seconds.  This effect stacks up to 3 times.
effectLines: While slotted, your other Ardent Flame abilities increase the damage of your next Molten Whip cast and Weapon and Spell Damage.
coefDescription: Lash an enemy with flame, dealing $1 Flame Damage.  If you strike an enemy that is immobile or stunned, you set them Off Balance.  Whenever you activate a different Ardent Flame ability, you gain a stack of Seething Fury, increasing the damage of your next Molten Whip by 33% and your Weapon and Spell Damage by 75 for 10 seconds.  This effect stacks up to 3 times.
